Quote.Author: Adam Savage
Quote.QuoteValue: We're not leaving here without Buster, man. Leave no crash-test dummy behind!

Quote.Author: Adam Savage
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a geek is all about learning the inventories of things

Quote.Author: Adam Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: The real tragedy of the poor is the poverty of their aspirations

Quote.Author: Adam Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Science is the great antidote to the poison of enthusiasm and superstition

Quote.Author: Adam Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: All money is a matter of belief

Quote.Author: Adam Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Humanity is the virtue of a woman, generosity that of a man

Quote.Author: Adam Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: On the road from the City of Skepticism, I had to pass through the Valley of Ambiguity

Quote.Author: Adam Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I have never known much good done by those who affected to trade for the public good

Quote.Author: Adam Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness never lays its finger on its pulse

Quote.Author: Adam Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Labor was the first price, the original purchase - money that was paid for all things

Quote.Author: Adam Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: No complaint... is more common than that of a scarcity of money

Quote.Author: Adam Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: This is one of those cases in which the imagination is baffled by the facts

Quote.Author: Adam West
Quote.QuoteValue: When you wear a mask and create a character, nothing will pigeonhole you faster

Quote.Author: Adam West
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always tried to fit what I do professionally into my family, rather than the other way around

Quote.Author: Adam West
Quote.QuoteValue: I have become convinced that everything that is classy doesn't go away

Quote.Author: Adam West
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a simple man, though my wife says I am complicated. I'll trust her on that one

Quote.Author: Adam West
Quote.QuoteValue: I have the curse of thinking funny!

Quote.Author: Adam West
Quote.QuoteValue: The word that scares the hell out of me is 'frail.' I don't want to be frail

Quote.Author: Adam West
Quote.QuoteValue: There were definitely times when I regretted ever being Batman

Quote.Author: Adam West
Quote.QuoteValue: Isn't it fun to be nuts? Isn't it fun to be crazy?

Quote.Author: Adam West
Quote.QuoteValue: My art, like my acting, is a profound expression of poetic license

Quote.Author: Adam West
Quote.QuoteValue: The Batmobile wasn't a stickshift, and it was a challenge to drive, believe me

Quote.Author: Adele
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't make music for eyes. I make music for ears

Quote.Author: Adele
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never been more normal than I am now

Quote.Author: Adele
Quote.QuoteValue: I have insecurities of course, but I don't hang out with anyone who points them out to me

Quote.Author: Adele
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a big personality. I walk into a room, big and tall and loud

Quote.Author: Adele
Quote.QuoteValue: I love hearing my audience breathe

Quote.Author: Adele
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm like Johnny Cash. I only wear black

Quote.Author: Adele
Quote.QuoteValue: I am quite loud and bolshie. I'm a big personality. I walk into a room, big and tall and loud

Quote.Author: Adele
Quote.QuoteValue: It's warts and all in my songs, and I think that's why people can relate to them

Quote.Author: Adele
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't write another breakup record. That would be a real cliche

Quote.Author: Adele
Quote.QuoteValue: Even if I did have, you know, a 'Sports Illustrated' body, I'd still wear elegant clothes

Quote.Author: Adlai E. Stevenson
Quote.QuoteValue: It's hard to lead a cavalry charge if you think you look funny on a horse

Quote.Author: Adlai E. Stevenson
Quote.QuoteValue: Making peace is harder than making war

Quote.Author: Adlai E. Stevenson
Quote.QuoteValue: Change is inevitable. Change for the better is a full-time job

Quote.Author: Adlai E. Stevenson
Quote.QuoteValue: Flattery is all right so long as you don't inhale

Quote.Author: Adlai E. Stevenson
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not the years in your life but the life in your years that counts

Quote.Author: Adlai E. Stevenson
Quote.QuoteValue: The human race has improved everything, but the human race

Quote.Author: Adlai E. Stevenson
Quote.QuoteValue: Those who corrupt the public mind are just as evil as those who steal from the public purse

Quote.Author: Adlai E. Stevenson
Quote.QuoteValue: Freedom rings where opinions clash

Quote.Author: Adlai E. Stevenson
Quote.QuoteValue: Nature is neutral

Quote.Author: Adlai E. Stevenson
Quote.QuoteValue: There was a time when a fool and his money were soon parted, but now it happens to everybody

Quote.Author: Adrienne Rich
Quote.QuoteValue: Lying is done with words and also with silence

Quote.Author: Adrienne Rich
Quote.QuoteValue: The moment of change is the only poem

Quote.Author: Adrienne Rich
Quote.QuoteValue: Pride is a tricky, glorious, double-edged feeling

Quote.Author: Adrienne Rich
Quote.QuoteValue: Life on the planet is born of woman

Quote.Author: Adrienne Rich
Quote.QuoteValue: When a woman tells the truth she is creating the possibility for more truth around her

Quote.Author: Adrienne Rich
Quote.QuoteValue: Art, whose honesty must work through artifice, cannot avoid cheating truth

Quote.Author: Adrienne Rich
Quote.QuoteValue: The mind's passion is all for singling out. Obscurity has another tale to tell

Quote.Author: Adrienne Rich
Quote.QuoteValue: A thinking woman sleeps with monsters

Quote.Author: Adrienne Rich
Quote.QuoteValue: I keep coming back to you in my head, but you couldn't know that, and I have no carbons

Quote.Author: Adrienne Rich
Quote.QuoteValue: False history gets made all day, any day, the truth of the new is never on the news

Quote.Author: Aesop
Quote.QuoteValue: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted

Quote.Author: Aesop
Quote.QuoteValue: Adventure is worthwhile

Quote.Author: Aesop
Quote.QuoteValue: A liar will not be believed, even when he speaks the truth

Quote.Author: Aesop
Quote.QuoteValue: We hang the petty thieves and appoint the great ones to public office

Quote.Author: Aesop
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not only fine feathers that make fine birds

Quote.Author: Aesop
Quote.QuoteValue: Destroy the seed of evil, or it will grow up to your ruin

Quote.Author: Aesop
Quote.QuoteValue: Gratitude is the sign of noble souls

Quote.Author: Aesop
Quote.QuoteValue: Slow but steady wins the race

Quote.Author: Aesop
Quote.QuoteValue: Appearances are often deceiving

Quote.Author: Aesop
Quote.QuoteValue: Beware lest you lose the substance by grasping at the shadow

Quote.Author: Agatha Christie
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the luckiest things that can happen to you in life is, I think, to have a happy childhood

Quote.Author: Agatha Christie
Quote.QuoteValue: But surely for everything you have to love you have to pay some price

Quote.Author: Agatha Christie
Quote.QuoteValue: If one sticks too rigidly to one's principles, one would hardly see anybody

Quote.Author: Agatha Christie
Quote.QuoteValue: The best time to plan a book is while you're doing the dishes

Quote.Author: Agatha Christie
Quote.QuoteValue: Very few of us are what we seem

Quote.Author: Agatha Christie
Quote.QuoteValue: Every murderer is probably somebody's old friend

Quote.Author: Agatha Christie
Quote.QuoteValue: Evil is not something superhuman, it's something less than human

Quote.Author: Agatha Christie
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything that has existed, lingers in the Eternity

Quote.Author: Agatha Christie
Quote.QuoteValue: Any woman can fool a man if she wants to and if he's in love with her

Quote.Author: Agatha Christie
Quote.QuoteValue: I specialize in murders of quiet, domestic interest

Quote.Author: Aimee Mullins
Quote.QuoteValue: True beauty is when someone radiates that they like themselves

Quote.Author: Aimee Mullins
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not an advocate for disability issues. Human issues are what interest me

Quote.Author: Aimee Mullins
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of my life is about will - having the will to prove what my body can do

Quote.Author: Aimee Mullins
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is about making your own happiness - and living by your own rules

Quote.Author: Aimee Mullins
Quote.QuoteValue: I've said this before, but I believe more than ever that confidence is sexier than any body part

Quote.Author: Aimee Mullins
Quote.QuoteValue: Pamela Anderson has more prosthetic in her body than I do. Nobody calls her disabled

Quote.Author: Aimee Mullins
Quote.QuoteValue: Sure, I'd love to have children some day. But world domination comes first

Quote.Author: Aimee Mullins
Quote.QuoteValue: In athletics, the idea of possibility is presumed. It's not 'if;' it's 'how.'

Quote.Author: Aimee Mullins
Quote.QuoteValue: With L'Oreal, I get to be Aimee Mullins, model. No qualifier. And that means everything to me

Quote.Author: Aimee Mullins
Quote.QuoteValue: The Pentagon isn't a place that champions individuality and innovation

Quote.Author: Aisha Tyler
Quote.QuoteValue: Success is not the absence of failure; it's the persistence through failure

Quote.Author: Aisha Tyler
Quote.QuoteValue: Pop culture hales you and wants you to fail

Quote.Author: Aisha Tyler
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm sure I had low-level scurvy all of my childhood

Quote.Author: Aisha Tyler
Quote.QuoteValue: You rarely see women being nice to each other on television anymore

Quote.Author: Aisha Tyler
Quote.QuoteValue: Wounds turn into scars and scars make you tough

Quote.Author: Aisha Tyler
Quote.QuoteValue: I won't apologize for choosing my career over kids

Quote.Author: Aisha Tyler
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up on the back of a motorcycle - my dad didn't have a car until I was a teenager

Quote.Author: Aisha Tyler
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a lot of good girlfriends that I really love, but you know, most of my close friends are men

Quote.Author: Aisha Tyler
Quote.QuoteValue: My hands are delicate and elegant, thank you very much. They're well-kept; my nails are clean

Quote.Author: Aisha Tyler
Quote.QuoteValue: Every culture is very important. Dartmouth has always been dedicated to diversity of culture

Quote.Author: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan
Quote.QuoteValue: My family is my strength and my weakness

Quote.Author: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not the type who'll yell about my achievements from the rooftops

Quote.Author: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan
Quote.QuoteValue: I always believed that my silence on several topics will be an advantage in the long run

Quote.Author: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just an average woman with average concerns

Quote.Author: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan
Quote.QuoteValue: I always knew I would be successful. So there was no element of surprise

Quote.Author: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a great story to tell... and I tell it well. No holds barred

Quote.Author: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, it's not about breaking big in Hollywood, but having interesting experiences

Quote.Author: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan
Quote.QuoteValue: I really don't work to a plan, but I just do what interests me and what I like to do

Quote.Author: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan
Quote.QuoteValue: The more you are blessed with experience, the fuller and the more enriched you are in your craft

Quote.Author: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan
Quote.QuoteValue: I was more excited than scared, at the opportunity to work in an English movie

Quote.Author: Al Franken
Quote.QuoteValue: No one is more sensitive to the issue of overeating than the creator of Stuart Smalley

Quote.Author: Al Franken
Quote.QuoteValue: It's easier to put on slippers than to carpet the whole world

Quote.Author: Al Franken
Quote.QuoteValue: Apple has long been a leading innovator of mobile technology; I myself own an iPhone

Quote.Author: Al Franken
Quote.QuoteValue: Progressives, in a way, are the new conservatives. We want to conserve what we fought to build

Quote.Author: Al Franken
Quote.QuoteValue: I do personal attacks only on people who specialize in personal attacks

Quote.Author: Al Franken
Quote.QuoteValue: It's the Power of the Almighty, the Splendor of Nature, and then you

Quote.Author: Al Franken
Quote.QuoteValue: Minnesotans know the difference between the job of satirist and the job of senator. And so do I

Quote.Author: Al Franken
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to reclaim 'liberal.' I'm a liberal, and I think most Americans are liberals

Quote.Author: Al Franken
Quote.QuoteValue: My daughter became a teacher right out of college

Quote.Author: Al Franken
Quote.QuoteValue: Humor and seriousness are not in opposition to each other

Quote.Author: Al Gore
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the cost of energy will come down when we make this transition to renewable energy

Quote.Author: Al Gore
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm naturally an optimist, but my basis for hope is rooted in my understanding of human nature

Quote.Author: Al Gore
Quote.QuoteValue: The first less is this: take it from me, every vote counts

Quote.Author: Al Gore
Quote.QuoteValue: Airplane travel is nature's way of making you look like your passport photo

Quote.Author: Al Gore
Quote.QuoteValue: A zebra does not change its spots

Quote.Author: Al Gore
Quote.QuoteValue: I have absolutely no plans and no expectations of ever being a candidate again

Quote.Author: Al Gore
Quote.QuoteValue: A low voter turnout is an indication of fewer people going to the polls

Quote.Author: Al Gore
Quote.QuoteValue: How could this Y2K be a problem in a country where we have Intel and Microsoft?

Quote.Author: Al Gore
Quote.QuoteValue: During my service in the United States Congress, I took the initiative in creating the Internet

Quote.Author: Al Gore
Quote.QuoteValue: The presidency is more than a popularity contest

Quote.Author: Al Pacino
Quote.QuoteValue: It's easy to fool the eye but it's hard to fool the heart

Quote.Author: Al Pacino
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't need bodyguards. I'm from the South Bronx

Quote.Author: Al Pacino
Quote.QuoteValue: I used to wear disguises, like hats and false beards, just to walk around and avoid attention

Quote.Author: Al Pacino
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm so shy now I wear sunglasses everywhere I go

Quote.Author: Al Pacino
Quote.QuoteValue: Money makes your life easier. If you're lucky to have it, you're lucky

Quote.Author: Al Pacino
Quote.QuoteValue: Vanity is my favourite sin

Quote.Author: Al Pacino
Quote.QuoteValue: There has been a lot of self-doubt and unwelcome events in my life

Quote.Author: Al Pacino
Quote.QuoteValue: The actor becomes an emotional athlete. The process is painful - my personal life suffers

Quote.Author: Al Pacino
Quote.QuoteValue: Shakespeare's plays are more violent than 'Scarface.'

Quote.Author: Al Pacino
Quote.QuoteValue: I've often said there's two kinds of actors. There's a more gregarious type and the shy type

Quote.Author: Al Yankovic
Quote.QuoteValue: My personal taste doesn't enter into it a lot when I make my decisions as to what to parody

Quote.Author: Al Yankovic
Quote.QuoteValue: When I go to my live shows it's often a multigenerational audience, a family bonding experience

Quote.Author: Al Yankovic
Quote.QuoteValue: Whenever I do a parody it's not meant to make you hate anybody's music really

Quote.Author: Al Yankovic
Quote.QuoteValue: There aren't that many superstars around anymore

Quote.Author: Al Yankovic
Quote.QuoteValue: If something is good enough, it can be out there and people will see it

Quote.Author: Al Yankovic
Quote.QuoteValue: People never ask people doing serious music, 'Do you ever think about doing funny music?'

Quote.Author: Al Yankovic
Quote.QuoteValue: Probably 90 percent of my albums have polka medleys

Quote.Author: Al Yankovic
Quote.QuoteValue: My hobbies just sort of gradually became my vocation

Quote.Author: Al Yankovic
Quote.QuoteValue: I've learned how to use my spam filter pretty effectively

Quote.Author: Al Yankovic
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm obviously not a rapper, and I don't have any claims to be one, really

Quote.Author: Alain de Botton
Quote.QuoteValue: What is fascinating about marriage is why anyone wants to get married

Quote.Author: Alain de Botton
Quote.QuoteValue: I was uncomfortable writing fiction. My love was the personal essay, rather than the novel

Quote.Author: Alain de Botton
Quote.QuoteValue: I am always anxious

Quote.Author: Alain de Botton
Quote.QuoteValue: Never, ever become a writer. It's a nightmare

Quote.Author: Alain de Botton
Quote.QuoteValue: My writing always came out of a very personal place, out of an attempt to stay sane

Quote.Author: Alain de Botton
Quote.QuoteValue: I went to church and couldn't swallow it. The music was nice but I don't belong there

Quote.Author: Alain de Botton
Quote.QuoteValue: Many moments in religion seem attractive to me even though I can't believe in any of it

Quote.Author: Alain de Botton
Quote.QuoteValue: I keep a picture of my beloved children close by. Also, water and plenty of pads and pens

Quote.Author: Alain de Botton
Quote.QuoteValue: My father paid for my education; then he made it clear that I was on my own

Quote.Author: Alain de Botton
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel that the great challenge of our time is the communication of ideas

Quote.Author: Alan Alda
Quote.QuoteValue: Be brave enough to live life creatively. The creative place where no one else has ever been

Quote.Author: Alan Alda
Quote.QuoteValue: When people are laughing, they're generally not killing one another

Quote.Author: Alan Alda
Quote.QuoteValue: It isn't necessary to be rich and famous to be happy. It's only necessary to be rich

Quote.Author: Alan Alda
Quote.QuoteValue: Be fair with others, but then keep after them until they're fair with you

Quote.Author: Alan Alda
Quote.QuoteValue: Almost everybody that's well-known gets tagged with a nickname

Quote.Author: Alan Alda
Quote.QuoteValue: Be as smart as you can, but remember that it is always better to be wise than to be smart

Quote.Author: Alan Alda
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never tried to manipulate my image

Quote.Author: Alan Alda
Quote.QuoteValue: Listening is being able to be changed by the other person

Quote.Author: Alan Alda
Quote.QuoteValue: Kids are natural scientists

Quote.Author: Alan Alda
Quote.QuoteValue: Backstage life is terrific training for an actor, seeing shows from the wings

Quote.Author: Alan Bennett
Quote.QuoteValue: Your whole life is on the other side of the glass. And there is nobody watching

Quote.Author: Alan Bennett
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm all in favour of free expression provided it's kept rigidly under control

Quote.Author: Alan Bennett
Quote.QuoteValue: Were we closer to the ground as children, or is the grass emptier now?

Quote.Author: Alan Bennett
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't believe in private education

Quote.Author: Alan Bennett
Quote.QuoteValue: If you think squash is a competitive activity, try flower arranging

Quote.Author: Alan Bennett
Quote.QuoteValue: I always feel over-appreciated but underestimated

Quote.Author: Alan Bennett
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is generally something that happens elsewhere

Quote.Author: Alan Bennett
Quote.QuoteValue: I write plays about things that I can't resolve in my mind. I try to root things out

Quote.Author: Alan Bennett
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm more socialist certainly than New Labour - I'm very old Labour, really

Quote.Author: Alan Bennett
Quote.QuoteValue: All knowledge is precious whether or not it serves the slightest human use

Quote.Author: Alan Furst
Quote.QuoteValue: When you move a border, suddenly life changes violently. I write about nationality

Quote.Author: Alan Furst
Quote.QuoteValue: Romantic love, or sex, is the only good thing in a life that is being lived in a dark way

Quote.Author: Alan Furst
Quote.QuoteValue: The best Paris I know now is in my head

Quote.Author: Alan Furst
Quote.QuoteValue: If you can live in Paris, maybe you should

Quote.Author: Alan Furst
Quote.QuoteValue: Moscow had this incredible, intense atmosphere of intrigue and darkness and secrecy

Quote.Author: Alan Furst
Quote.QuoteValue: Spy novels are traditionally about lone wolves, but how many people actually live like that?

Quote.Author: Alan Furst
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a historian. I do a lot of research, and I try to get it right

Quote.Author: Alan Furst
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm basically an Upper West Side Jewish writer

Quote.Author: Alan Furst
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't make accommodations in crucial situations and be heroic

Quote.Author: Alan Furst
Quote.QuoteValue: You write a lot of books; you hope you get better

Quote.Author: Alan Greenspan
Quote.QuoteValue: Protectionism will do little to create jobs and if foreigners retaliate, we will surely lose jobs

Quote.Author: Alan Greenspan
Quote.QuoteValue: Any informed borrower is simply less vulnerable to fraud and abuse

Quote.Author: Alan Greenspan
Quote.QuoteValue: If I turn out to be particularly clear, you've probably misunderstood what I've said

Quote.Author: Alan Greenspan
Quote.QuoteValue: Anything that we can do to raise personal savings is very much in the interest of this country

Quote.Author: Alan Greenspan
Quote.QuoteValue: History has not dealt kindly with the aftermath of protracted periods of low risk premiums

Quote.Author: Alan Greenspan
Quote.QuoteValue: Revolutions are something you see only in retrospect

Quote.Author: Alan Greenspan
Quote.QuoteValue: Finance is wholly different from the rest the economy

Quote.Author: Alan Greenspan
Quote.QuoteValue: We really can't forecast all that well, and yet we pretend that we can, but we really can't

Quote.Author: Alan Greenspan
Quote.QuoteValue: We're a democratic society. Shutting down the government should not be on the agenda

Quote.Author: Alan Greenspan
Quote.QuoteValue: Unless you are willing to compromise, society cannot live together

Quote.Author: Alan Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't leave home without your sword - your intellect

Quote.Author: Alan Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: Writing is a very focused form of meditation. Just as good as sitting in a lotus position

Quote.Author: Alan Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't really think that very much is interesting about the superhero as an archetype

Quote.Author: Alan Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're functional, it doesn't matter if you're mad

Quote.Author: Alan Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think any of us grew up into the world we were hoping for or expecting

Quote.Author: Alan Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the smell of paper in the morning; it smells like victory

Quote.Author: Alan Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that in an increasingly virtual world, lovingly produced artefacts are at a premium

Quote.Author: Alan Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: All culture must have arisen from cult

Quote.Author: Alan Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: If the audience knew what they wanted then they wouldn't be the audience, they would be the artist

Quote.Author: Alan Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm remote from most technology to the point that I'm kind of Amish

Quote.Author: Alan Rickman
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a lot less serious than people think

Quote.Author: Alan Rickman
Quote.QuoteValue: It would be wonderful to think that the future is unknown and sort of surprising

Quote.Author: Alan Rickman
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a love-hate relationship with white silk

Quote.Author: Alan Rickman
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think it's right that everybody knows everything about me

Quote.Author: Alan Rickman
Quote.QuoteValue: If you could build a house on a trampoline, that would suit me fine

Quote.Author: Alan Rickman
Quote.QuoteValue: Somebody with Debbie Reynolds' features doesn't get cast as the Wicked Witch

Quote.Author: Alan Rickman
Quote.QuoteValue: What is it about actors? God knows I get bored with actors talking about themselves

Quote.Author: Alan Rickman
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a nightmare to sit and watch a film that I'm in. There's a horrible inescapability to it

Quote.Author: Alan Rickman
Quote.QuoteValue: So you can't judge the character you're playing ever

Quote.Author: Alan Rickman
Quote.QuoteValue: I like it when stories are left open

Quote.Author: Alanis Morissette
Quote.QuoteValue: Your political views really denote your spiritual views

Quote.Author: Alanis Morissette
Quote.QuoteValue: Peace of mind for five minutes, that's what I crave

Quote.Author: Alanis Morissette
Quote.QuoteValue: We'll love you just the way you are if you're perfect

Quote.Author: Alanis Morissette
Quote.QuoteValue: The person who knows HOW will always have a job. The person who knows WHY will always be his boss

Quote.Author: Alanis Morissette
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to walk through life instead of being dragged through it

Quote.Author: Alanis Morissette
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm doing it because I choose it. And if it's not working, I can make a change

Quote.Author: Alanis Morissette
Quote.QuoteValue: I remember thinking during those times that I wanted to write in a way where there are no rules

Quote.Author: Alanis Morissette
Quote.QuoteValue: The thing I always default to is that I'll always be here to write songs

Quote.Author: Alanis Morissette
Quote.QuoteValue: You live, you learn

Quote.Author: Alanis Morissette
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll be writing songs till I die. There's just no question

Quote.Author: Albert Ellis
Quote.QuoteValue: You largely constructed your depression. It wasn't given to you. Therefore, you can deconstruct it

Quote.Author: Albert Ellis
Quote.QuoteValue: The art of love is largely the art of persistence

Quote.Author: Albert Ellis
Quote.QuoteValue: People don't just get upset. They contribute to their upsetness

Quote.Author: Albert Ellis
Quote.QuoteValue: I hope to die in the saddle seat

Quote.Author: Albert Ellis
Quote.QuoteValue: Freud had a gene for inefficiency, and I think I have a gene for efficiency

Quote.Author: Albert Ellis
Quote.QuoteValue: If something is irrational, that means it won't work. It's usually unrealistic

Quote.Author: Albert Ellis
Quote.QuoteValue: Most people would have given up when faced with all the criticism I've received over the years

Quote.Author: Albert Ellis
Quote.QuoteValue: People got insights into what was bothering them, but they hardly did a damn thing to change

Quote.Author: Albert Ellis
Quote.QuoteValue: People have motives and thoughts of which they are unaware

Quote.Author: Albert Ellis
Quote.QuoteValue: Rational beliefs bring us closer to getting good results in the real world

Quote.Author: Albert Schweitzer
Quote.QuoteValue: The purpose of human life is to serve, and to show compassion and the will to help others

Quote.Author: Albert Schweitzer
Quote.QuoteValue: There are two means of refuge from the miseries of life: music and cats

Quote.Author: Albert Schweitzer
Quote.QuoteValue: Do something wonderful, people may imitate it

Quote.Author: Albert Schweitzer
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness is nothing more than good health and a bad memory

Quote.Author: Albert Schweitzer
Quote.QuoteValue: The first step in the evolution of ethics is a sense of solidarity with other human beings

Quote.Author: Albert Schweitzer
Quote.QuoteValue: Example is leadership

Quote.Author: Albert Schweitzer
Quote.QuoteValue: Example is not the main thing in influencing others. It is the only thing

Quote.Author: Albert Schweitzer
Quote.QuoteValue: The tragedy of life is what dies inside a man while he lives

Quote.Author: Albert Schweitzer
Quote.QuoteValue: Do not let Sunday be taken from you. If your soul has no Sunday, it becomes an orphan

Quote.Author: Albert Schweitzer
Quote.QuoteValue: We are all so much together, but we are all dying of loneliness

Quote.Author: Alec Baldwin
Quote.QuoteValue: Remember, sex is like a Chinese dinner. It ain't over 'til you both get your cookie

Quote.Author: Alec Baldwin
Quote.QuoteValue: I just love Rome. It really does cast a spell on you

Quote.Author: Alec Baldwin
Quote.QuoteValue: Getting older is hard

Quote.Author: Alec Baldwin
Quote.QuoteValue: I wish I could play the lead role in one movie, one great movie

Quote.Author: Alec Baldwin
Quote.QuoteValue: For better or ill, I was very heavily influenced by men I knew who always dressed formally

Quote.Author: Alec Baldwin
Quote.QuoteValue: Grown-ups yell. I don't know why, but they do

Quote.Author: Alec Baldwin
Quote.QuoteValue: You have a lot of optimism when you are young

Quote.Author: Alec Baldwin
Quote.QuoteValue: My children are the only thing in my life that makes me happy
